verbose_text: The abnormal inflammation and apoptosis in renal I/R injury induce the production of massive pro inflammatory cytokines and cell apoptosis, which in turn further exaggerated inflammation and cell apoptosis, leading to serious apoptosis and necrosis in the kidney [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: inflammation and apoptosis in renal I/R injury induce the production of massive pro-inflammatory cytokines and cell apoptosis
